alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Putnam County through 700 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hollister, or 7 miles west of Palatka, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, East Palatka, Bostwick, Orange Mills, Bardin, Hollister and Carraway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
